if.test: (startDate != null and startDate != '') and (endDate != null and endDate != '')

sql.if: AND t1.VISIT_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND t1.VISIT_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

mapper.select: SELECT /* selectComingListCount */ COUNT(1) FROM RYHR.RYHCF05MT t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN RYHR.RYHCF04MT t2 ON t1.VISIT_SEQ = t2.VISIT_SEQ WHERE 1=1

SELECT /* selectComingList */ b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT t1.VISIT_SEQ, t1.VISIT_COMPANY, t1.VISIT_NAME, TO_CHAR(t1.VISIT_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VISIT_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(t1.VISIT_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VISIT_END_DATE, t1.MEET_DEPT_CODE, t1.MEET_DEPT_NAME, t1.MEET_SABUN, t1.MEET_NAME, t1.REG_DEPT_CODE, t1.REG_DEPT_NAME, t1.REG_SABUN, t1.REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(t1.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(t1.UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_DATE, t2.PARKING_SEQ, NVL2(t2.VISIT_SEQ,'Y','N') TICKET_CHECK FROM RYHR.RYHCF05MT t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN RYHR.RYHCF04MT t2 ON t1.VISIT_SEQ = t2.VISIT_SEQ WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY t1.VISIT_SEQ DESC ) a ) b WHERE b.RNUM >= #{startRow} AND b.RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT /* selectComing */ VISIT_SEQ, VISIT_COMPANY, VISIT_NAME, TO_CHAR(VISIT_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VISIT_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(VISIT_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VISIT_END_DATE, MEET_DEPT_CODE, MEET_DEPT_NAME, MEET_SABUN, MEET_NAME, REG_DEPT_CODE, REG_DEPT_NAME, REG_SABUN, REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_DATE FROM RYHR.RYHCF05MT WHERE 1=1
AND VISIT_SEQ = #{visitSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* insertComing */ INTO RYHR.RYHCF05MT ( VISIT_SEQ, VISIT_COMPANY, VISIT_NAME, VISIT_START_DATE, MEET_DEPT_CODE, MEET_DEPT_NAME, MEET_SABUN, MEET_NAME, REG_DEPT_CODE, REG_DEPT_NAME, REG_SABUN, REG_NAME, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RYHCF05MT.NEXTVAL, #{visitCompany}, #{visitName}, TO_DATE(#{visitStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{meetDeptCode}, #{meetDeptName}, #{meetSabun}, #{meetName}, #{regDeptCode}, #{regDeptName}, #{regSabun}, #{regName}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* updateComing */ RYHR.RYHCF05MT SET VISIT_COMPANY = #{visitCompany}, VISIT_NAME = #{visitName}, VISIT_START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{visitStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), MEET_DEPT_CODE = #{meetDeptCode}, MEET_DEPT_NAME = #{meetDeptName}, MEET_SABUN = #{meetSabun}, MEET_NAME = #{meetName}, UPD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE VISIT_SEQ = #{visitSeq} AND REG_SABUN = #{regSabun}
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectStatisticsByDept */ S1.DEPT_CODE, S1.DEPT_NAME, NVL(S2.COUNT_HOUR2, 0) COUNT_HOUR2, NVL(S2.COUNT_HOUR3, 0) COUNT_HOUR3, NVL(S2.COUNT_HOUR4, 0) COUNT_HOUR4, NVL(S2.COUNT_HOUR6, 0) COUNT_HOUR6, NVL(S2.COUNT_HOUR24, 0) COUNT_HOUR24, NVL(S2.TOTAL_COUNT, 0) TOTAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT T1.DEPT_CODE, T1.DEPT_PARCO, LPAD(' â””', 2*(LEVEL-1)) || T1.DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME FROM (SELECT DEPT_CODE, CASE DEPT_CODE WHEN '0001' THEN NULL ELSE DEPT_PARCO END DEPT_PARCO, DEPT_NAME FROM RYHR.RYHZZ02MT WHERE STATE_GB = '1') T1 START WITH T1.DEPT_PARCO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.DEPT_CODE = T1.DEPT_PARCO) S1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REF_DEPT_CODE, SUM(COUNT_HOUR2) COUNT_HOUR2, SUM(COUNT_HOUR3) COUNT_HOUR3, SUM(COUNT_HOUR4) COUNT_HOUR4, SUM(COUNT_HOUR6) COUNT_HOUR6, SUM(COUNT_HOUR24) COUNT_HOUR24, SUM(COUNT_HOUR2 + COUNT_HOUR3 + COUNT_HOUR4 + COUNT_HOUR6 + COUNT_HOUR24) TOTAL_COUNT FROM RYHR.RYHCF04MT WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS = 'AA' AND IS_WEB_SALE = 'N' AND GIVE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND GIVE_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 GROUP BY REF_DEPT_CODE) S2 ON S1.DEPT_CODE = S2.REF_DEPT_CODE WHERE DEPT_CODE != '0001'

SELECT /* selectStatisticsByDept */ ROWNUM RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT PARKING_SEQ, VISIT_SEQ, VISIT_COMPANY, VISIT_NAME, VISIT_PURPOSE, TO_CHAR(GIVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') GIVE_DATE, COUNT_HOUR2, COUNT_HOUR3, COUNT_HOUR4, COUNT_HOUR6, COUNT_HOUR24, STATUS, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, REG_SABUN, REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') UPD_DATE, REF_DEPT_CODE, REF_DEPT_NAME FROM RYHR.RYHCF04MT WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS = 'AA' AND IS_WEB_SALE = 'N' AND GIVE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND GIVE_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 ORDER BY GIVE_DATE ) a

SELECT /* selectStatisticsByVisitor */ ROWNUM RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT t1.VISIT_SEQ, t1.VISIT_COMPANY, t1.VISIT_NAME, TO_CHAR(t1.VISIT_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VISIT_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(t1.VISIT_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VISIT_END_DATE, t1.MEET_DEPT_CODE, t1.MEET_DEPT_NAME, t1.MEET_SABUN, t1.MEET_NAME, t1.REG_DEPT_CODE, t1.REG_DEPT_NAME, t1.REG_SABUN, t1.REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(t1.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(t1.UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_DATE, NVL2(t2.VISIT_SEQ,'Y','N') TICKET_CHECK FROM RYHR.RYHCF05MT t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN RYHR.RYHCF04MT t2 ON t1.VISIT_SEQ = t2.VISIT_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND t1.VISIT_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND t1.VISIT_START_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 ORDER BY t1.VISIT_SEQ DESC ) a

SELECT /* selectStatisticsByWebSale */ ROWNUM RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT PARKING_SEQ, VISIT_SEQ, VISIT_COMPANY, VISIT_NAME, VISIT_PURPOSE, TO_CHAR(GIVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') GIVE_DATE, WEB_SALE_PRICE, STATUS, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, REG_SABUN, REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') UPD_DATE, REF_DEPT_CODE, REF_DEPT_NAME FROM RYHR.RYHCF04MT WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS = 'AA' AND IS_WEB_SALE = 'Y' AND GIVE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND GIVE_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 ORDER BY GIVE_DATE ) a
